description: Functions for working with wall vertices

functions.name: count
functions.description: Get the number of wall vertices.

functions.name: find
functions.description: Get the WallVertex object with the given ID number.

returns.description: WallVertex object with the specified ID, or None if not found

functions.name: inbox
functions.signature: itasca.wall.vertex.inbox(lower_bound: vec, upper_bound: vec, boundary: bool = False) -> tuple of WallVertex
functions.description: Get vertices with extents intersecting a box. If boundary is True, only return vertices inside the extent.

parameters.name: lower_bound
parameters.description: Lower bound of the bounding box

parameters.name: upper_bound
parameters.description: Upper bound of the bounding box

parameters.name: boundary
parameters.description: If True, only return vertices inside the extent

returns.description: Tuple of WallVertex objects within the specified box
Maximum wall vertex ID in use

functions.name: near
functions.description: Find the closest vertex to a point.

returns.description: Closest WallVertex object to the specified point
